A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I rarely see movies in the theater\, but the visuals and sound in these films are too good not to experience on the big screen. If you're looking for a feel good rom-com where everything works out in the end then this probably isn't for you\, but if you liked The Force Awakens\, you're going to love this. I thought it was awesome\, but I like all the Star Wars movies so I'm probably biased. I'm just looking forward to having new films on a consistent basis for a long time to come. It's a great time to be a Star Wars fan!
